channel.title: Authors on Constantin Stamatiadis
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Constantin Stamatiadis

item.description: I’m a Roboticist with a Multi-Cultural background. I have in-depth tech know-how but have always been keen on discovering other fields. I’m currently working on Deep Learning based Sensor Fusion Technology, focusing on early fusion object Detectors and Transformer based trackers. Before that, my curiosity lead me to embark on the JMP journey at Bosch. A 2-year multi-rotation graduate program to discover Bosch and grow as a future leader. My current focus lies in the world of Autonomous Systems (Robotics & Autonomous Driving).
